summary: Remove the ugly bronze skin effect from Bijin mods
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/gE6AORs.png[/img][/center]
I have made this mod for personal use, but I decided to share.

This mod removes the vanilla ugly bronze skin effect when the weather is clear (with sun) and the character goes to a shadow from Bijin Mods (Warmaidens, Wifes and NPCs) from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2650523]rxkx22[/url] for CBBE and UNP versions, this mod is all in one, you don't need a version for each Bijin mod, just install the version based in your Bijin version what you have (CBBE or UNP) and enjoy.

This mod applies just for Bijin mods, for other NPCs and your Character you need the original mod from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/342801]yllib[/url] what you [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29791/?]can download it here[/url].




[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/6tgJvKm.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40038/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/hLIAEqD.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63473/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/lXkVABs.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71054/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/MDvAOXD.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
[b]New support added in 2.0[/b]

[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38326/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/NKmthjD.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74256/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/prlMtZr.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

You don't need have all Bijin mods, if you can have just one for example, Warmaidens or Wives.



[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/gcy8rIE.png[/img][/center]
Order of Install: Bijin mods > Bijin Customizer (if you use it) > My mod.

[b]Manual Install[/b]
Extract files in Data Folder, just Overwrite the files when asked.

[b]MO[/b]
My mod need stay under Bijin mods (with more priority) to overwrite.



[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/v6fuFW0.png[/img][/center]
[b]Manual Uninstall[/b]
It's not possible uninstall my mod manually, you need to reinstall Bijin mods and overwrite.

[b]MO[/b]
It's safe for just turn off or remove.



[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/fMWZTn1.png[/img][/center]

Bethesda for make the game
Yllib for solve this annoying bug
Rxkx22 for he's great mod Bijin
author: Gradash
